Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Host/guest C–H···π interaction and size/shape selectivity

Other Information.Additional Info: Selective adsorption over trans-DCE with high purity (>96%) in both liquid and vapor phases.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size/shape mismatch preventing penetration into the cavity

Other Information.Additional Info: Negligible uptake observed; unable to fit into the intrinsic cavity of the macrocycle.

Experimental Validation.Method: Solid-vapor adsorption experiments, PXRD, SCXRD, TGA, GC analysis

Other Information.Additional Info: Macrocycles are recyclable and reusable without loss of performance; stable under basic and humid conditions but degrade in acidic environments.
